title: CS Practical Competency Enhancement: Emotion Recognition and Visualization-Based Mathematics Instruction in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more ethical considerations of emotion recognition technology in online learning environments.
Learners can identify peers' cognitive-emotional states in real-time and establish collaboration strategies using learning analytics tools.
By interpreting emotion visualization data during project-based assessments, learners can improve math problem-solving efficiency by over 20%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
